text: Ke kaloku musani ukuphikisana nabantu beNcwadi koko makube ngendlela elungileyo, ngaphandle kokuba ngabo benza intswela bulungisa phakathi kwabo, yithani ke nina (kubo): “Siyakholwa thina koko kutyhilwe kuthi kukwatyhilwe kuni yaye uThixo wethu noThixo wenu Mnye; yaye thina singamaMuslim aKhe.”
